content: To obtain the Thunderbone, you need to defeat Black Loong in Fright Cliff in Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. You need the Loong Scales to be able to trigger this fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Thunderbone.md', within the main section titled 'Thunderbone'.
The content is as follows:
To obtain the Thunderbone, you need to defeat Black Loong in Fright Cliff in Rockrest Flat in Yellow Wind Ridge. You need the Loong Scales to be able to trigger this fight.
